document_data.name: Morgan Ildacer
document_data.mainbody: '''Morgan Ildacer''' was the [[aquatic elf]] captain of the High Mages' guard in [[Sylkiir]] and a member of the [[Nantarn Council]].
document_data.Personality: Morgan was an ill-tempered and over-arrogant elf. He respected only power and martial skills. So, inside the Council, he was influenced only by [[Nalos]] and the [[shalarin]] [[Ri'ola'kirk]].
document_data.Activities: Despite Morgan's objections, Myth Nantar was garrisoned also with troops from other [[Selu'Maraar]]'s military units.
